summary:
If you like to make random looking female characters or followers - this mod is for you.
Clean female diffuse textures with new optional subsurface and specular maps.Preferable with ENB ,UNP* 7B* body family variations.
4 optional nipples as variants.
Don't hesitate,create common Skyrim females and followers as individuals !!
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ffd966]Info
=======================================[/color]
Female texture mod I made as a support to MC for creating random NPC and Followers.
Based on UNP, so it's compatible to 7Base and variables body meshes.
It is a clean 2k body texture with optional subsurface and specular maps for tweaking ENB SSS shaders. 
[color=#00ff00]Ru [/color]
------------------------------
Мод замены 2к текстур для второстепенных персонажей или разных последователей, для ENB
Созданные на базе семейства моделей UNP and 7Base.Опциональные виды сосков для разнообразия
Опциональные варианты текстур спекуляра (_s) и эпидермиса (_sk) для ковыряния в шейдерах SubSurface.  

[color=#f1c232]Installation \ Инсталяция[/color]
=======================================
Manual unpack the contents to the Data texture folders (or follower folder) \ don't forget to make a backup of orig textures if you will not like it.
\
бэкапим старые текстуры и кидает новые в ваши data\texture или в папку фолловера. 

[color=#f1c232]Recommendation mod \ Рекомендую с модом[/color]
=======================================
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3329763]xs2reality[/url] Sporty Sexy Map for msn

-------------------------------------------------------------
